review: ** ** *** **** ***** ********** ** ****** My son Ebaad was born at Fortis GK 2 and he was the doctor present there along with Doctor Bhutani at the time of his birth and since last 5 years we visit him either at Fortis or at Triton whenever we need to consult a pediatrician. He gives decent time to understand the issue and is very humble and patient. Prescribe very less amount of strong medicines keeping children's imunity and side-effects etc in mind....we wish him all the best and thank him for all his help whenever we needed. Best regards. Farzaan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very nice to listen to the problems. He is very  cordial and also responds over phone in emergencies. He is very experienced and diagnoses very aptly.
He is nice doctor for baby. He listen carefully all our concern. Provide right suggestion . Extremely satisfied with his way to treat a baby.
